page.title: 07SCOUTS IN GARFORTH
page.content: {Scouts}is an organization for boysaged from lO. There are 2 scout units in Garforth. One is the{First {Garforth,}based in their own hut next to{St. Mary's}hall. Mine is{East {Garforth Burma Troop.}Our hut is still being built so we meet at{East {Garforth School,}from{7.45-9.OOpm.}We wear a{uniform}of green shirts and beige trousers and enjoy all sorts of outdoor and indoor activities, li8ke{ {mapping, knotmaking, walking, {canoeing, swimming, camping, survival {weekends and abseiling.}Abseiling is climbing down a cliff suspended by a rope. Survival weekends are when you make your own shelter, sleep in a big plastic bag and build a fire to cook your own food. Scouts stops children from getting bored, and gives a chance to make new friends and learn useful new skills.
